#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int 
ll a[1000000];
int main()
{
	ll x,n,k,i,count=0;
	scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
			
	}
	sort(a,a+n);

	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		if(a[i]==a[i+1])
		continue;
		if((a[i]%2==1)&&(a[i]<k))
		count++;
	}
	printf("%lld",count);
	return 0;
}
